title: Opinion: Opinion | Trump, Xi, Putin - In The Age Of Strongmen, The Peril For 'Middle Powers'
summary_full: There is a need for democracies like India, Brazil, Europe and Canada to form new alliances; otherwise, we will have to live in a world dominated by strongmen and transactional leaders like Trump and Xi.
summary_public: There is a need for democracies like India, Brazil, Europe and Canada to form new alliances; otherwise, we will have to live in a world dominated by strongmen and transactional leaders like Trump and Xi.
